definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位于西枝江旁，风景优美，适合居住。

sentences.english: The plant is at a distance of 12km to Dabaodang Town . with convenient traffic and excellent surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 该厂距大保当镇12公里，交通便利，环境优美。

sentences.english: A beautiful ballad written by Hins Cheung.
sentences.chinese: 这是张敬轩写的一首很优美动听的歌曲。

sentences.english: Here we arrived at end of a very scenic Tad Sae waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我们在一个非常优美塔德世瀑布年底抵达。

sentences.english: West Lake has a Sai Tai, breakwaters repair a Form 6 beautiful bridge.
sentences.chinese: 湖西部有一西堤，堤上修有六座造形优美的桥。

sentences.english: The skaters glided gracefully over the ice.
sentences.chinese: 溜冰者们在冰面上优美地滑行。

sentences.english: Guangning is the home of bamboo and famous for its picturesque scenery .
sentences.chinese: 广宁是著名的竹子之乡，以优美的自然景色而出名。

sentences.english: Nature composes some of her loveliest poems for the microscope and telescope.
sentences.chinese: 自然为显微镜和望远镜创作了一些她最优美的诗。

sentences.english: In the rain, a 11)blackbird was singing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 在雨中，一只乌鸫正在鸣唱，歌声优美动听。

sentences.english: With kettle body, portable and novelty, fashionable and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 优美流线型壶体，小巧玲珑，时尚大方，精致典雅。

sentences.english: For the best verse hasn't been rhymed yet.
sentences.chinese: 因为最优美的诗篇还没写成。

sentences.english: You can spot reduce for tight abs or toned arms.
sentences.chinese: 你能恰好减肥到拥有紧缩的腹肌和优美的手臂。

sentences.english: A beautiful ecological environment is the sign of a city with modern civilization.
sentences.chinese: 优美的生态环境是现代化文明城市的重要标志。

sentences.english: Apart from its beautiful natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 钦州除了自然环境优美。

definition: serene and elegant (of a place)/ethereal (of music)
